original_text: Again, if the trumpet does not sound a clear call, who will get ready for battle?
korean_text: 만일 나팔이 분명하지 못한 소리를 내면 누가 전투를 준비하리요

sentences.original_text: Again, if the trumpet does not sound a clear call
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 나팔이 명확한 소리를 내지 않으면

sentences.original_text: who will get ready for battle?
